msg: This will act as the sender in the clientside

author: jaliya
msg: This class will push the client side messages to the Queue as and when they
are arrived. This will not do the actual sending work

author: jaliya
msg: This is the class that  handles the storage functionality in the client side.
This has implemented the IStorageManager interface and provde the access to
the Queue for the client side

author: jaliya
msg: Added a method getNextMessageNumber(String sequenceID); to get the
next message number. This will be used by the RMSender to set the
message numbers in to the messages
